borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of building contract pursuant to condition 3; temporary fencing pursuant to condition 4; drawings in plan, section and elevation at a scale of not less than 1:20 and details of materials (including samples) of the front boundary treatment pursuant to condition 5; samples of materials pursuant to condition 6; drawings of fenestration pursuant to condition 10; preliminary risk assessment report pursuant to condition 13; site investigation scheme pursuant to condition 14; quantitative risk assessment report pursuant to condition 15; remediation method statement pursuant to condition 16; construction management plan pursuant to condition 19; Construction Logistics Plan pursuant to condition 20; piling method statement pursuant to condition 31 of planning permission ref: 2016/04496/FUL granted 12th December 2016.
